content:
Are you a developer or a startup building healthcare applications? We would love to chat with you!

My name is Alfredo and I work at the Tooling team here at Commure (https://developer.commure.com). Commure is building a FHIR-native open Platform for healthcare developers, and we’d love your expert opinion about what it is you actually need to make better FHIR-native software.

This would be a super casual 30 min chat at any time that works for you during the next couple of weeks. We are a young startup so regretfully can’t offer any gift cards, but will send you the softest t-shirt on Earth and a pretty awesome face mask :)

If you are interested in participating just sign up here:

https://calendly.com/commure-tooling-team/user-interview

or DM me!

We're now able to offer a $75 Amazon Gift Card as a way to thank you for your time :tada:

DM me if you have 30 mins to chat in the near future or schedule a time that works for you here:

https://calendly.com/commure-tooling-team/user-interview
